    implicit none

    integer :: N, ans, diff, bin, i, current_index
    integer, allocatable :: values(:), perm(:)
    character(len=20) :: s
    character(len=20) :: processed_str
    integer :: cnt =0, tmp =0

    ! First part: compute ans

    read(*,*) N

    allocate(values(N), perm(N))

    read(*,*) values(1:N)

    perm = [(i, i=1,N)]

    ! Sort perm based on values(perm)

    call sort(perm, key=values(perm)) diff =0
    bin =0

    do i =1, N

        current_index = perm(i) -1

        if (mod(bin,2) .ne. mod(current_index,2)) then

            diff = diff +1

        end if

        bin = bin +1

        bin = mod(bin,2)

    end do

    ans = diff /2

    !

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: N, ans, diff, bin, i, current_index
    integer, allocatable :: values(:), perm(:)
    character(len=20) :: s
    character(len=20) :: processed_str
    integer :: cnt =0, tmp =0

    ! First part: compute ans

    read(*,*) N

    allocate(values(N), perm(N))

    read(*,*) values(1:N)

    perm = [(i, i=1,N)]

    ! Sort perm based on values(perm)

    call sort(perm, key=values(perm))

    diff =0
    bin =0

    do i =1, N

        current_index = perm(i) -1

        if (mod(bin,2) .ne. mod(current_index,2)) then

            diff = diff +1

        end if

        bin = bin +1

        bin = mod(bin,2)

    end do

    ans = diff /2

    ! Convert ans to string s

    write(s, '(I0)') ans

    ! Process s to replace BC with D

    processed_str = ''

    do i =1, len_trim(s)

        if (i < len_trim(s) .and. s(i:i) == 'B' .and. s(i+1:i+1) == 'C') then

            processed_str = trim(processed_str) // 'D'

            i = i +1

        else

            processed_str = trim(processed_str) // s(i:i)

        end if

    end do

    ! Process processed_str to compute cnt

    cnt =0
    tmp =0

    do i =1, len_trim(processed_str)

        select case (processed_str(i:i))

        case ('A')

            tmp = tmp +1

        case ('D')

            cnt = cnt + tmp

        case default

            tmp =0

        end select

    end do

    ! Output the result

    print*, cnt

    deallocate(values, perm)

end program main
